items.name: Galaxy Fog IPA
items.desc: An IPA showcasing one of our favourite hops; Galaxy! Super pale & chit make up the grist, whilst the Galaxy hops bring their characteristic Passion fruit and peach to meld with the peachy esters from our house yeast.

items.name: Gardens Of Green IPA
items.desc: Gardens of Green is a dual hop IPA series, tailoring recipe and process to best express each hop combination. We’ve paired Enigma & Moutere to create an IPA bursting with white grape, resin & passion fruit.

items.name: Multiverse IPA
items.desc: Mutiverse is a series of beers in which we explore what it means for a single beer to exist in multiple states. Each beer has similarities and differences, each connected but existing in it’s own unique state. Level I starts with extra pale, chit & flaked oats that provide a soft base where Galaxy hops take the spotlight, supported by Topaz & Bru-1 for aromas of passion fruit, resin and pineapple.

items.name: Pintle Pale Ale
items.desc: Pintle is our core pale pale ale, brewed with wheat, oats and flaked barley in the grist for a smooth body; Whirlpooled & dry hopped with both Australian Cascade and Citra, its restrained bitterness and dry finish help maintain Pintle's all day crushability

items.name: Reflections Series | Chinook IPA
items.desc: Our Reflections series uses the same hop variety grown in two different parts of the world. This IPA showcases Chinook hops from both the UK & America, highlighting and celebrating the diversity in taste and aroma that can be achieved from a single varietal grown over two continents with aromas of citrus, passion fruit & apricot.

items.name: Solar Dawn Pale Ale
items.desc: Pale, vienna, munich, caragold & flaked oats make up the malt bill to give us plenty of body and enough sweetness for the ripe mango and bright citrus aromatics of Idaho 7, Chinook, Citra & Sultana
